dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kaspi.kz just hit its fifth year as Kazakhstan's top e-commerce company.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: the website just hit its fifth year as Kazakhstan's top e-commerce company.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they've got, uh, over 15 million customers now. That's huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they've got, uh, over fifteen million customers now. That's huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And three million products? With free delivery? That's a game-changer for the region.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Plus, they're really pushing support for local businesses—accelerated payments, marketing help…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Plus, they're really pushing support for local businesses-accelerated payments, marketing help...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Mikhail Lomtadze mentioned that. He's their CEO, right?

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, co-founder. And he hinted at expanding into Georgia and Uzbekistan soon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, co-founder. And he hinted at expanding into Georgia and Uzbekistan soon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, that's ambitious. The Forbes Kazakhstan ranking must've been a big deal for them.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is prepared annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's not just revenue—they look at customer satisfaction, merchant growth…

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ranking is based on revenue from online sales.

dialogue_turns.text: No kidding. Free delivery and loyalty program probably help with that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No kidding. Free delivery and loyalty program probably help with that.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's like a win-win. More jobs, more growth… hard to argue with that.
